snippet: Outfielder Ben Revere has agreed to a $4 million, one-year contract with the Los Angeles Angels, three weeks after Washington allowed him to become a free agent....
lead_paragraph: Outfielder Ben Revere has agreed to a $4 million, one-year contract with the Los Angeles Angels, three weeks after Washington allowed him to become a free agent.

headline.main: Outfielder Ben Revere Agrees to $4M, 1-Year Deal With Angels
headline.print_headline: Outfielder Ben Revere Agrees to $4M, 1-Year Deal With Angels
